newsitem.title: PERU: Peru's Luz del Sur sets dividend.
newsitem.headline: Peru's Luz del Sur sets dividend.

text.p: Peru's electricity distributor Luz del Sur has agreed to pay a dividend of 0.1153 soles per share from its 1996 profits, the Lima Stock Exchange said Monday.
The exchange said the record date for the dividend -- totalling 57.2 million soles ($21.7 million) -- was April 7 and the payout date April 16.

Last August, the electricity firm Luz del Sur divided its distributing and consumer services arms to create two new companies. The distributor kept the name Luz del Sur and the services' company became known as Luz del Sur Servicios .

Luz del Sur Servicios has set a dividend totalling 1.2 million soles of 0.036 soles per share from its 1996 profits, the exchange said, adding the record and payout dates are the same as for its sister company.
The Lima bolsa made Luz del Sur, the electricity distributor, a blue chip stock in January.
